name: Account Subsidiary Map
description: A list of general ledger accounts and the subsidiaries that they are mapped to.

name: Accounting Periods
description: Basic information about accounting periods.

name: Assembly Item With Components
description: Returns an Assembly Item and its components.

name: Bins - Empty
description: A list of empty warehouse bins.

name: BUILTIN.RELATIVE_RANGES Examples
description: Returns the start and end values for all relative date ranges that the BUILTIN.RELATIVE_RANGES function currently supports.

name: Company Features
description: A list of NetSuite features that are avaialble and/or enabled in the account.

name: Countries
description: A list of countries that NetSuite supports.

name: Currencies
description: A list of currencies, with symbols, latest exchange rates, etc.

name: Currency Rates
description: Historical currency exchange rates.

name: Custom Fields
description: Lists all custom fields in the account.

name: Custom Lists
description: Lists all custom lists in the account.

name: Custom Record Types
description: Lists all custom record types in the account.

name: Custom Segments
description: Lists all custom segments, including the names of the tables in which the segment values are stored.

name: Customer Invoices - By Date Range
description: Returns all customer (accounts receivable) invoices for a given date range, with totals and statuses.

name: Customers - With Overdue Balances
description: Returns customers that have overdue balances.

name: Dates and Time - Creation Examples
description: Shows how you can create dates and timestamps based on strings.

name: Dates and Time - Format Models
description: Examples of datetime format elements.

name: Deleted Records
description: Returns information about records that have been deleted.

name: Employees - Emergency Contacts
description: Emergency contact information for employees.

name: Employees - Last Logins
description: Lists all employees that have NetSuite access, and the date/time that they last logged in.

name: Employees - No Recent Logins
description: Employees that have not logged in recently.

name: Employees - Roles and Permissions
description: Lists all employees, their assigned roles, and the permissions granted.

name: Employees - With Edit, View, Email URLs
description: Lists all employees, with edit, view, and email URLs in the results.

name: Entities - Types
description: Lists all entity types, with BUILTIN.DF and BUILTIN.CF values.

name: File Cabinet - Top Level Folders
description: Returns a list of folders in the root of the File Cabinet.

name: General Ledger Impact by Transaction Type
description: Lists all transaction types and the general ledger accounts that they post to.

name: Hello World
description: An obligatory "Hello World" query in SuiteQL fashion.

name: Item Fulfillments - for Specified Sales Order
description: Lists all item fulfillments for a specified Sales Order ID.

name: Items - Item Group Members
description: Lists members of an Item Group, including their list prices.

name: Items - In Alternate Warehouse Bins
description: Lists items that are in stock and stored in bins that are not the item's primary bin.

name: Items - Inventory Analysis
description: Designed for inventory analysis, this query returns active items, various quantities (on hand, committed, available, reorder point, preferred stock level), the preferred vendor, the average resale price and purchase cost, quantities sold (in the last 30 days, 90 days, year, and lifetime), and more.

name: Items - Expired or Expiring Soon
description: Returns items that have expired, or are about to expire within a certain number of days.

name: Items - Summarized by Type
description: Lists the number of active items group by item type.

name: Items - With Expiration Dates
description: Lists items that have expiration dates.

name: Items - Without Preferred Bins
description: Lists items that do not have a preferred bin.

name: Journal Entries - In Date Range
description: Returns journal entry transactions in a given date range.

name: Leads - For A Specific Sales Rep
description: Provides leads assigned to a specified sales rep.

name: Leads - Summarized by Sales Rep
description: Provides a summarized list of sales reps and the number of leads that they've been assigned.

name: Pagination and Record Count Example
description: Returns paginated results that includes the total number of rows found.

name: Purchase Orders - Summarized by Status
description: Returns the various statuses of purchase orders, with the number of orders in each status, and the total amounts.

name: Purchase Orders - Item Receipts
description: Returns items that have been received against POs in a given date range.

name: Returns Authorizations - In Date Range
description: A list of Return Authorizations (RAs / RMAs) that have been issued in a specified date range.

name: Returns Authorizations - Summarized by Customer
description: A list of Return Authorizations (RAs / RMAs) that have been issued in a specified date range, summarized by customer.

name: Returns Authorizations - Summarized by Item
description: A list of Return Authorizations (RAs / RMAs) that have been issued in a specified date range, summarized by item.

name: Roles - Active Roles Not Used Recently
description: Returns the active roles that haven't been used in the past 90 days.

name: Roles - Active Roles And The Date Last Used
description: Returns all active roles, and includes the date that each role was most recently used.

name: ROLLUP - Oracle Command Example
description: Used to append a summary row to the result set.

name: Sales Order - With Sales Tax
description: Returns header-level values for a specified Sales Order, including the Tax Total value sourced from the related TransactionLine records.

name: Sales Orders - Summarized by Status
description: Returns the various statuses of sales orders, with the number of orders in each status, and the total amounts.

name: Shipments
description: Returns all shipments (item fulfillments) made within a specified date range. Includes tracking numbers, package information (ship from and to addresses, weight, shipping / handles charges), and more.

name: Shipment Details
description: Returns detailed shipment information based on date criteria. Includes the customer, sales order, customer po, the warehouse, that it shipped from, carrier / method, total weight, number of items shipped, tracking number(s), and the items / quantities that shipped.

name: States
description: A list of states that NetSuite supports.

name: Support Cases - Closed - Summarized by Assignee
description: Returns closed support cases summarized by the employee that they are assigned to.

name: Support Cases - Open - Detailed
description: Returns details about open support cases.

name: Support Cases - Open - Summarized by Assignee
description: Returns open support cases summarized by the employee that they are assigned to.

name: Support Cases - Open - Summarized by Status
description: Returns open support cases summarized by status.

name: Transaction Line Usage
description: Returns the number of Transaction Lines generated in the last 6 months, grouped by transaction type.

name: Transaction Counts - By Type and Status
description: Returns the total number of transactions in each type / status combination.

name: Transactions - GL Impact
description: Get the GL impact for a specified transaction.

name: Transactions - GL Impact - Revisited
description: Get the GL impact for a specified transaction.

name: Transactions - Statuses
description: Lists status codes for all transaction types.
